items.sentence: It would be better if you didn\'t go outside today.
Tom told everyone that Mary couldn\'t speak French.
Why have you never said anything about this before?
Why didn\'t you ever tell me how you felt about me?
Why don\'t you just do it now and get it over with?
I don\'t often get home on Monday until about 2:30.
Why is everybody making such a big deal about this?
I told Tom you weren\'t going to be there tomorrow.
I couldn\'t have gotten this far without your help.
I couldn\'t help but overhear what you said to Tom.
